function_reachability: Is there a call path from function 'main' to function 'sort'?

loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'i < 10' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'i < 10' always executed?

Is the loop with condition 'j < 10' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < 10' without passing through its header block?

data_dependency: Is variable 'A (line 3)' used after its definition?
Is variable 'i (line 5)' used after its definition?
liveness: Does variable 'i (line 5)' remain in use at the end of function 'sort'?
Is variable 'A (line 3)' live at the end of function 'sort'?
dead_code: Can the statement 'A[i] = (float)((int)(rand() * 1000) / 100);' be considered dead code?
